head.title: Spend your Easter break in a holiday home | Interhome
head.description: Spend an unforgettable Easter break in a cosy Interhome holiday apartment or in a spacious villa with room for the whole family.

links.label: Safe, enjoyable holidays - discover our holiday ideas
Book a holiday apartment for Easter

content.title: Book a holiday apartment for Easter

content.textLeft:
Enjoy some relaxation time at Easter

Whether it's only a few days or an extended holiday over Easter - enjoy Easter and the arrival of Spring in your own holiday house. Colourful fields of flowers, the warming rays of spring sunshine and a cosy, good value holiday apartment or a spacious holiday house for the whole family - what more do you need for proper relaxation?

>> Lots of attractive destinations
content.textRight:
Spend your family holiday in self-catering accommodation

Do you prefer a long walk through stunning mountain scenery or is winter when you start looking forward to your next holiday by the sea? Would you like to surprise your partner with a romantic stay in a holiday apartment? Or is Easter when you are looking to have an adventure-filled family holiday in a spacious villa or cottage? Irrespective of where you’d most like to spend your Easter holiday and the people you’d like to spend it with, you’ll find the right accommodation at excellent rates with Interhome.

content.title: Filter our wide range according to your requirements:

content.text: Why not book an idyllic holiday apartment with sea views, a cosy cabin in the mountains or a holiday villa with lots of bedrooms and enough space for the extended family for your Easter break? You’ll find the right accommodation to meet all your needs with Interhome.

Easter in Germany

Have you thought about spending the Easter holidays in Germany for a change? It’s a great idea as you’ll discover breathtaking landscapes and vibrant cities there. Be amazed by the blooming spring landscapes, have a refreshing swim in the North Sea or enjoy a challenging hike in the Black Forest. Regardless of the type of holiday you have in mind, you’re sure to find an idyllic location in this diverse country... And with Interhome you’ll find the right holiday apartment for your needst. And those who prefer a bit more space can book an entire holiday house for the Easter holidays in Germany - that way you can make it really cosy.
Germany | North Sea | Black Forest

Easter in Holland

Spend Easter in Holland and enjoy the colourful streets of Amsterdam. Or relax in a holiday apartment by the North Sea. Be it Noord-Holland or Zuid-Holland: a trip to the Netherlands is always worthwhile. 
Holland | Amsterdam | Noord-Holland | Zuid-Holland

Easter in Italy

Be it Lake Garda, Tuscany or Venice: the unique culture, historical buildings and excellent food are just some of the reasons to be impressed by Italy. The perfect mix of relaxation and adventure!
Italy | Lake Garda | Adria/Veneto | Tuscany | Venice | Florence

An Easter break to France

Those who prefer to hunt for their Easter eggs in France can spend their Easter holiday on the picturesque Côte d'Azur. Those not wanting to travel that far can enjoy Brittany in the west of France and dive into the Atlantic for a refreshing spring swim. 
France | Côte d'Azur   

Easter holidays in Austria: hiking and wellness

The Easter holidays are perfect to visit the regions of Austria away from the crowds. Depending on the weather and your preferences, you can plan beautiful hiking trips, e.g in the Salzkammergut, Gasteinertal, Lungau, in Tyrol, Carinthia, Vorarlberg or Styria. Be enchanted by the blossoming spring landscapes and enjoy the culinary delights of the region. And after your hiking tour, you may enjoy the in-house sauna or spa offered in some of our holiday homes. No matter what kind of holidays you are looking for, in Austria you are sure to find a heavenly place to suit your taste ... and the perfect holiday apartment with Interhome. And if you like it more spacious, you can also book one of the many holiday houses that we offer in Tyrol where you can make yourself comfortable and feel right at home.
Austria | Salzburg | Tyrol | Carinthia | Vorarlberg | Styria   

Easter holidays in Spain

¡Felices Pascuas! Spain offers some wonderful locations for your Easter break. Have a great time on an Easter trip to Mallorca. In mid-April you’ll generally be able to enjoy a dip in the sea in some lovely warm temperatures. Perfect for the kids to play around in, as well as for relaxing in secluded bays, hiking or for letting your hair down in the clubs along the beachfront. The Costa Blanca on Spain’s east coast is also a great place to spend the Easter holidays.
Spain | Mallorca | Costa Blanca   

City breaks in the Easter holidays

A city break to a fascinating big city is a great idea for all those who prefer to take their annual leave in summer but who would nevertheless like to get away for a couple of days over Easter. Spend your Easter holidays in Berlin, Paris, Rome or in another major city in Europe. With Interhome, you’ll be able to find the right holiday accommodation for your stay.
Prague | Paris | Rome | Vienna

A last minute Easter break

Easter is getting ever closer and you still haven’t found any accommodation for your Easter holiday? Then take a look at our last minute offers. Those who book last minute can expect a discount of up to 33 percent on many holiday houses and apartments. So all those who book on the spur of the moment and want to get away with a friend/partner or with the whole family will be sure to find the right accommodation with Interhome and even save some hard cash along the way!

content.headline: Safety in your holiday home!
content.key: Safe hand-over of the key on-site

elements.title: Only selected and tested accommodation
elements.subtitle: Quality is our number one priority
elements.caption: Every property is checked before your arrival to ensure the best possible stay.

elements.title: Guaranteed availability and on-site service
elements.subtitle: Make the most of our experience
elements.caption: Key collection is arranged by our helpful staff.  Available 24/7 or on-site service to help you with all your questions, e.g.: tips and insights for your holiday destination and your booked accommodation.

elements.title: A memorable holiday experience
elements.subtitle: Privacy and freedom in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Be your own boss, eat whenever you want and make the most of plenty of space for all your friends and family.

elements.title: Why Interhome
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, feel the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or the Spanish way of life. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online - quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your holiday home
elements.caption: Your stay in a holiday house or a holiday apartment offers plenty of advantages: spend your time exactly as you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Simply enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your holiday home.
